cmg.cnsim.engine.node

Class NodeSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmg.cnsim.engine.node.NodeSet

  • public class NodeSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a set of nodes participating in a network
    Author:
    Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNode()
      Adds a new node to the NodeSet using the configured node factory.
      void addNodes(int num)
      Add a number num of nodes in the NoteSet, using the sampler specified in the Simulation object supplied to the NodeSet object
      void closeNodes()
      Perform any closing reporting to all nodes.
      java.lang.String debugPrintNodeSet()
      Returns a string displaying the NodeSet.
      java.util.ArrayList<INode> getNodes()
      Get the actual ArrayList object.
      int getNodeSetCount()
      Returns how many nodes are contained in the NodeSet
      float getTotalHonestHP()
      Returns the total honest hash power of the nodes in the NodeSet.
      INode pickRandomNode()
      Returns a random node from the NodeSet
      INode pickSpecificNode(int nodeID)
      Returns a specific node from the NodeSet
      java.lang.String[] printNodeSet()
      Generates an array of strings representing the NodeSet.

      • NodeSet

        public NodeSet(AbstractNodeFactory nf)
        Constructs a new NodeSet using the provided AbstractNodeFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • addNode

        public void addNode()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a new node to the NodeSet using the configured node factory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while creating a new node.

      • addNodes

        public void addNodes(int num)
        Add a number num of nodes in the NoteSet, using the sampler specified in the Simulation object supplied to the NodeSet object
        Parameters:
        num - Is the number of nodes to add.

      • closeNodes

        public void closeNodes()
        Perform any closing reporting to all nodes.

      • debugPrintNodeSet

        public java.lang.String debugPrintNodeSet()
        Returns a string displaying the NodeSet.
        Returns:
        A string displaying the node IDs, the power of each and whether it is malicious

      • getNodes

        public java.util.ArrayList<INode> getNodes()
        Get the actual ArrayList object. TODO: refactor so that this is not needed.
        Returns:
        The Arraylist object with the nodes

      • getNodeSetCount

        public int getNodeSetCount()
        Returns how many nodes are contained in the NodeSet
        Returns:
        The number of nodes in the NodeSet

      • getTotalHonestHP

        public float getTotalHonestHP()
        Returns the total honest hash power of the nodes in the NodeSet.
        Returns:
        The total honest hash power.

      • pickRandomNode

        public INode pickRandomNode()
        Returns a random node from the NodeSet
        Returns:
        a Node object

      • pickSpecificNode

        public INode pickSpecificNode(int nodeID)
        Returns a specific node from the NodeSet
        Parameters:
        nodeID - The of the node to be picked.
        Returns:
        The node object.

      • printNodeSet

        public java.lang.String[] printNodeSet()
        Generates an array of strings representing the NodeSet. Each element of the array represents a node in the NodeSet and includes the node's ID, electric power, hashpower, electricity cost, cost per GH, average connectedness, and total cycles.
        Returns:
        An array of strings representing the NodeSet.
